text: "Motorcycle Mama" is a song written by John Wyker and performed by Sailcat. It reached #12 on both the U.S. pop chart and the U.S. adult contemporary chart in 1972. It was featured on their 1972 album Motorcycle Mama. The song was produced by Pete Carr. The song ranked #89 on Billboard magazine's Top 100 singles of 1972. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable |- !scope="col"| Chart (1971) !Peak position |- |Australia (Kent Music Report) | style="text-align:center;"| 64 |- |United States (Billboard 200) | style="text-align:center;"| 12 |} ==Other versions== *The Sugarcubes released a version of the song on the 1990 compilation album Rubáiyát: Elektra's 40th Anniversary. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:1972 debut singles Category:Elektra Records singles
title: Motorcycle Mama
